name: Mario VS Luigi & Moomoo
description:
This is a mod of ipodtouch0218's online remake of Mario VS Luigi that adds Moomoo as a playable character!

What is this game?

A standalone 2-10 player remake of the Mario vs Luigi gamemode from New Super Mario Bros DS. Includes the 5 default levels (Grassland, Bricks, Castle, Pipes, and Ice), along with custom levels: Jungle, Sky, and Volcano! All powerups are implemented and fully faithful to their originals, along with the addition of NSMBWii's Propeller Suit / Ice Flower!

Moomoo enters the battle

Moomoo joins the frey in this version of Mario VS Luigi! He is a completely new character complete with custom models, sounds, and animations!

Moomoo is different to Mario and Luigi

Moomoo is heavier than Mario and Luigi and this comes with pros and cons. He can jump much faster than the two plumbers, but he falls like a brick and can't wall-jump to save his life. On the plus side, Moomoo's ground pound is a super strong belly flop!

Source Code

The mod's source code is here: https://github.com/Alzter/MarioVsLuigiAndMoomoo
The game was made using Unity 2022.1.12f1. This mod is based on version 1.7.1.0-beta of New Super Mario Bros. Versus.
